pddl:
(define (domain simple_switch)
   (:requirements :typing)
   (:types switch)
   (:predicates (off ?s - switch)
        (on ?s - switch))

   (:action switchon
       :parameters (?s - switch)
       :precondition (and (off ?s))
       :effect (and  (not (off ?s))
            (on ?s)))
   (:action switchoff
       :parameters (?s - switch)
       :precondition (and (on ?s))
       :effect (and (not (on ?s)) (off ?s))))
